description:
BootRacer Monitors Boot Time and Detects Slow Startup Programs!

BootRacer finds out which programs slow down Windows boot-up process!
Version: 9.40.2025.902 - September 02 2025
- Added the tweak to disable the "Let's finish setting up your device" screen, which blocks Windows from completing its normal boot-up process.
- Updated the UI design themes.
- Updated the finish screen themes.
- Added Slovenian translation.
- Updated Turkish translation.
- Fixed the small bugs.
